relevance_explanation: The routine only includes logic relevant to the customer. The `get_customer_loyalty_info_extra(customer_id)` call was correctly replaced with the appropriate greeting based on their loyalty points, and the negative branch in step 2b was correctly pruned because cancellation is allowed.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer were preserved. The logic to process a refund was kept because the customer purchased insurance.
